thread.section_title: Olmsted Falls & Olmsted Township community blog
thread.title: Halt Ohio's ESSA plan until state testing is cut, 150 angry educators, officials tell state
thread.title_full: Halt Ohio's ESSA plan until state testing is cut, 150 angry educators, officials tell state

author: Patrick O'Donnell, The Plain Dealer
title: Halt Ohio's ESSA plan until state testing is cut, 150 angry educators, officials tell state
text: Educators from Lorain and Cuyahoga counties want Ohio to hold off submitting its Every Student Succeeds Act (ESSA) plan for federal approval until it meets the public's main demand - cutting testing.
